description.hltext_display: FCT - The Challenges of Public Transport
description.content:
The transport system today in Abuja, the FCT has invariably been harrowing and chaotic, given the difficulties commuters go through on a daily basis and the situation is further compounded by the dwindling service delivery efficiency of the Abuja Mass Transit Bus services.
Abuja, the Federal Capital Territory of Nigeria was meant to be an exclusive model city with all developmental infrastructure put in place by our government, in order to meet with international standards. A survey revealed the increasing rate at which the public transportation system of the FCT is fast declining and a couple of reasons have been advanced.
Meanwhile, the relocation of the Federal Capital from Lagos to Abuja by the then military administration of Gen. Ibrahim Babagida, has contributed to the sudden burst in population growth in Abuja.
It was gathered that obvious reasons range from rural - urban migration, which adds to the population density amongst others. It was also learnt that the transportation problem, if not critically addressed, may lead to an urban mobility crises - a situation which is already creating fear in the minds of commuters in the territory.
The ban on commercial motorcyclists also known as Okada and the introduction of Abuja mass transit transportation could be a 'light out of darkness,' but today it is difficult for commuters in satellite towns to benefit from such buses due to the challenges faced by the public mass transit.
At present, these buses plying various routes usually filled with passengers seem adequate to meet the transportation needs of commuters.
Apart from the fact that the buses are far from being sufficient to meet the needs of commuters who, due to relatively economic harsh conditions, are compelled to use public transport, the buses have totally become deficient in terms of the quality of service.
According to Mark Nnenna, a business man who owns a shop in Wuse Market, it is frustrating while trying to board Abuja mass transit buses, especially residents of Nyanya, Mararaba areas. After waiting for several hours at the bus-stop to board such transport service the rate at which passengers, in great numbers struggle to catch the bus calls for concern. And some who seem to be more economical with their resources gain their entrance through the windows of the buses.
According to a report, one of the major reasons for the near collapse or declining level of the transport service today in Abuja is the poor maintenance alongside the financial crisis rocking the transport company, among which are the corrupt attitude and incompetence of the company's administration.
This consequently has led to the declining service of the buses. Others who spoke on the issue while on board said, "this trend is just an indication of administrative incompetence that has taken over the FCT. Therefore, those in authority of our transport service around the FCT are advised to strategically create modality for providing quality service for passengers."
Meanwhile, it was disclosed that the Abuja mass transit bus companies which set out in 2005, with about 650 buses, which some of the outfits got on concession from the FCT administration. It was noted that such companies today do not have up to 100 functional buses plying the roads.
However, one expects the administrators of the FCT to look critically into the ugly situation faced by government-owned transport service and provide a lasting solution to commuters who board such buses, in order to avoid unnecessary burden, at the bus-stop.
According to Samuel Ojo, getting a bus from Mararaba, where he resides especially at 8am, to Wuse is very difficult. He also said that the transport fare he pays is on the high side, due to the rush-hours.
He, therefore, advised the government to take urgent steps. LEADERSHIP gathered that at late hours when passengers are at bus-stops in places like Wuse and Mararaba areas they fall victims of criminals who pretend to be commuter transport operators but who end up robbing passengers of their belongings.
Meanwhile, the pains and frustration of traffic congestion has crept into some parts of the city, like Wuse, Asokoro, Garki and others. The Abuja Mass Transit company needs a total over haul as the system is collapsing and turning into a shadow of its past in terms of inefficient service delivery.
A lot of buses have broken down, and the few available ones are inadequate to meet the demands of the people, while poor maintenance culture, poor coverage of transport routes, poor coordination, and others are now the order of the day, with all these boiling down to managerial inefficiency in the system.

description.hltext_display: アンチェロッティ：「次節のドログバは復調するはず」
description.content: ［Goal.com］ マラリアによるコンディション不良などもあったチェルシーＦＷディディエ・ドログバは、今シーズンまだ本調子にはなっていない。前節トッテナム戦では途中出場で同点ゴールを決めたものの、後半ロスタイムにＰＫのチャンスを外してしまった。だが、以前から同選手へ変わらぬ信頼を示すカルロ・アンチェロッティ監督は、ドログバが調子を取り戻してきていると感じているようだ。チェルシーは２７日、アーセナルとのビッグマッチを迎えるが、アンチェロッティ監督はこの試合でこれまでと違うドログバが見られるはずと語った。「彼が良いコンディションになかったことは分かっている。彼はマラリアの問題を抱え、疲れていたし、１００％の状態ではなかった。練習するのも大変だったんだ。１００％ではなかったものの、私はここ数試合で彼を起用した。彼のキャラクターとパーソナリティーが必要だったからだ「でも今、コンディションは良くなっている。前節（トッテナム戦）で途中出場し、彼は良いリアクションを見せてくれた。トッテナム戦でゴールを決めたし、彼は次の試合で違うドログバを見せてくれるはずさ」

description.hltext_display: 《赵丹》央八开播 王雨揭明星儿子“赵茅”面纱
description.author: www.qq.com
description.content:
王雨《赵丹》扮相
王雨和邢岷山在片场
王雨造型照
昨晚，大型电视剧《赵丹》正式在央视八套播出。该剧是为纪念著名电影表演艺术家赵丹诞辰90周年而拍摄，剧中首次披露了赵丹儿子赵茅的真实经历。年青演员王雨出演“赵茅”一角。
赵茅是电影明星赵丹和第一任妻子叶露茜的儿子，但人们对其生平所知甚少。赵茅长在上海，幼年却被送入孤儿院，随后经历父母离异，待成年从电影学院毕业后，事业发展不顺利，感情之路也坎坷重重，甚至在父亲赵丹死后连追悼会都被后妈阻止参加。
在电视剧《赵丹》中饰演“赵茅”的是青年演员王雨。王雨自中戏毕业后，星途顺利，先后接拍电视剧《海上传奇》(电视版 电影版)《大祠堂》《同龄人》《燃烧的生命》《娘家的故事》《中国地》的拍摄，大胆与斯琴高娃、潘虹、李幼斌、萨日娜、林心如等人同台飙戏，成长迅速。目前，由王雨主演的电视连续剧更在全国各地轮番播出。近期，《同龄人》正在吉林卫视播出，《海上传奇》正在珠海电视台播出，《大祠堂》正在福建电视剧频道播出，
据悉，王雨将于1月初进驻刘江导演新剧《策反者》的剧组，与吴秀波合作出演。更多详细情况，请关注后续报道。

description.hltext_display: "Öldürmezsem Anneme Tecavüz Edecekti"
description.content: Samsun'da evlerine gelip annesi, Güller B.'ye tecavüz etmek isteyen komşuları C. K'yi tabancayla öldüren 16 yaşındaki F.B. hakim karşısına çıktı Canik İlçesi Gölalan Köyü'nde Ağustos ayından meydana gelen olayda, iddiaya göre eşinin kendisini terk etmesinden 47 yaşındaki Hamit B.'yi sorumlu tutan C. K., aralarında husumet bulunan ailenin evine gitti. Kapıyı açan eşi Güller B.'ye, "Karım senin kocanla ilişkisi yüzünden beni terk etti. Yuvamı yıktınız. Namus meselesi neymiş size göstereceğim" diyerek başka bir odaya doğru sürekleyip tecavüz etmek istedi. Güller B.'nin bağırıp yardım istemesi üzerine uyanan oğlu F.B. komşuları olan C. K.'yi tabancayla ateş ederek öldürdü. Nöbetçi mahkemeye sevk edilen F.B. tutuklandı. Samsun 2'nci Ağır Ceza Mahkemesi'nde ömür boyu hapis cezası istemiyle dün ilk kez hakim karşısına çıkarılan F.B., babası Hamit ile öldürdüğü Cemil Karakurt'un eşi hakkında köyde dedikodu çıktığını anlatırken şöyle dedi: "C. K, eşinin kendisini terk etmesinden dolayı babamı suçluyordu. "BANA DA KÜFÜR ETTİ" Aramızda husumet vardı. Sabah, annemin çığlık seslerine uyandım. Seslerin geldiği odaya girince C. K annemin elbiselerini çıkarmaya çalışırken gördüm. Annemi bırakmasını istedim. Bana da küfür etti. Ben de ölen amcamdan kalan ruhsatsız tabancayı alarak tekrar odaya döndüm. Annemi bırakmasını tekrarladım. Aldırmayınca 1 el ateş ettim. Annemi bırakıp benim üzerime gelmeye başladı. Korkuyla ateş etmeye devam ettim. Onu öldürmesem anneme tecavüz edecekti." "SENİN KOCAN KARIMI NASIL YAPTIYSA" Duruşmada tanık olarak dinlenen anne Güller B. olay günü eşi ve büyük oğlunun işte olduğunu söyleyerek, "Zil çalınınca kapıyı açtım. C. K., üzerime saldırdı. 'Senin kocam benim karımı nasıl yaptıysa ben de seni yapacağım' diyerek beni sürekleyerek odaya soktu ve elbiselerimi çıkarmaya başladı. Boğuşurken çığlık atmaya başladım. Bu sırada oğlum geldi. Beni bırakmasını istedi. Bırakmayınca da tabancayla ateş etti. Oğlum onu öldürmeseydi bana tecavüz edecekti" diye konuştu. Dava tanıkların dinlenmesi için ertelendi. İsmail AKDUMAN/Samsun (DHA) 23 dakika önce.. [2430021]

description.hltext_display: PSD: Reeleição de Cavaco "é ... [17]
description.content:
O líder do PSD afirmou que o partido não está apenas confortado com o seu candidato, como está motivado António Cotrim/Lusa O presidente do PSD, Pedro Passos Coelho, afirmou hoje perante os deputados sociais-democratas que a reeleição de Cavaco Silva como "é indispensável para o caminho" que é preciso "trilhar no futuro".
Num discurso durante o jantar de natal do grupo parlamentar social-democrata, no Centro de Congressos de Lisboa, Pedro Passos Coelho referiu que o PSD "durante o próximo mandato presidencial aspira a ser Governo" e sugeriu: "Imaginem o que era a possibilidade de estarmos à frente do Governo a conduzir um projeto de mudança profunda na sociedade portuguesa, que volte a colocar Portugal no caminho do crescimento, e ter Manuel Alegre como ". Pedro Passos Coelho prometeu que o PSD vai "dizer bem alto que é indispensável para Portugal que Cavaco Silva volte a ser eleito " e envolver-se "ativamente na sua campanha" para as presidenciais de 23 de janeiro de 2011.
Segundo o presidente do PSD, se Cavaco Silva for reeleito Portugal terá um "que não é contra o Governo nem contra a maioria que quiser, com legitimidade, governar o país", que vai "manter a imparcialidade sobre os partidos" e " ser um fator de agregação e de união entre todos os portugueses".
"Nós estamos não apenas confortados como motivados com o candidato que apoiamos. Tem sido um bom e temos a certeza que Cavaco Silva continuará a ser um bom ", disse. Dirigindo-se aos portugueses que poderão não ir votar por estarem convencidos da vitória de Cavaco Silva, acrescentou: "Eu quero dizer-lhes que esse resultado é indispensável para o caminho que temos de trilhar no futuro no nosso país".

description.hltext_display: Villesèquelande. Succès du marché de Noël
description.content:
La troisième édition du marché de Noël organisée par Les Veillées de la Tour a remporté, dimanche dernier, un franc succès. Ce marché ce déroulait sur trois sites : la salle presbytérale, le foyer communal et le cellier La Voie romaine, reliés par « Bubulle », le petit train conduit par Erick. La salle presbytérale, avec dans l'entrée le stand de l'Association, vente d'olives, boules de Noël, photos, écharpes et chaussons fabrication « maison »; dans les différentes salles, peintures diverses, pâte à sel, compositions florales, lampes en bois flotté, bijoux en perle de verre.
Le foyer communal accueillait des exposants aux diverses décorations, peinture sur verre, émail, tissus, etc., les vins, fromages, confitures, pain d'épices et le stand de l'association qui a assuré la restauration et le vin chaud. La tombola a remporté un vif succès. Le cellier La Voie romaine, avec le vin et les produits régionaux, les huîtres de notre ami Archimbault, et divers exposants. Que ce soit côté public ou exposants, tout le monde s'accorde à dire que ce fut une journée très réussie autant sur le plan de l'organisation que sur celui de la fréquentation ou de la qualité des produits purement artisanaux exposés. Convivialité et bonne humeur étaient au rendez-vous. Les enfants (et même les plus grands) ont été éblouis par les maquillages de Christian. En milieu d'après-midi , un public nombreux est allé chercher le Père Noël à la maison presbytérale et tout le monde a fait le tour du village avec « Bubulle » qui a déposé son convoi au foyer municipal pour la distribution de friandises et la séance photo si attendue de la part des petits mais aussi des plus grands… Nous remercions tous les participants à quelque niveau que ce soit qui ont contribué à la réussite de cette journée.
Au prochain marché de Noël!

description.hltext_display: インテル、ラノッキア獲得にサントンを差し出す？
description.content: ［Goal.com］ インテルは長期離脱したＤＦワルテル・サムエルの代役として、ジェノアと共同保有するＤＦアンドレア・ラノッキアを１月に獲得したいと願っている。だが、ジェノアのプレツィオージ会長は即座の同選手放出を望んでおらず、移籍金として１２００万ユーロを要求しているようだ。ラノッキア本人も残留の意向を表しているが、インテルとジェノアは良好な関係にある。メディアによると、クリスマスまでに去就が決まる可能性があるようで、交渉の進展が注目されるところだ。イタリア『コッリエレ・デッロ・スポルト』によると、インテルはラノッキアを獲得するために、ＤＦダヴィデ・サントンを代役として移籍させる可能性もあるという。サントン本人もジェノアへのレンタル移籍には好意的とも言われるが？ほかにも、共同保有するＦＷマッティーア・デストロや若手ＤＦクリスティアーノ・ビラーギ、ＭＦレネ・クリンら、インテルの若手選手たちがラノッキア移籍の鍵を握るかもしれない。

description.hltext_display: Media: JN, i e O Jogo são únicos diários nas bancas nos dias de Natal e de ...
description.content:
Lisboa, 22 dez (Lusa) - O Jornal de Notícias, o i e O Jogo são os únicos diários que irão para as bancas nos dias de Natal e de Ano Novo, apurou a agência Lusa junto de fontes dos diferentes órgãos de media.
Os restantes diários generalistas -- Correio da Manhã, Público e Diário de Notícias --, não publicam edições nos dias 25 de dezembro e 01 de janeiro, segundo fontes dos títulos.
A nível desportivo, o Jogo, do grupo Controlinveste, é o único que vai para as bancas, com A Bola e o Record a não ir para as bancas nos feriados de Natal e Ano Novo.

description.hltext_display: Lighty leads Buckeyes
description.author: Staff, news services
description.content:
Lighty, who came in averaging 11.6 points, had 23 at halftime. He left with 10:23 left ? one shy of his career high ? and did not return.
William Buford added 14 points, former Bishop Luers star Deshaun Thomas had 13 and Jared Sullinger added nine points and 16 rebounds for the Buckeyes (11-0). Lighty hadn�t hit double figures in his past four games but had that covered in the opening 2:45.
He almost outscored the Bulldogs in the opening half by himself. He hit 9 of 12 shots from the field including 5 of 7 three-pointers as the Buckeyes led 48-24.
Down 26 points in the opening half, the Bulldogs scored 10 of the first 12 points in the second half to pull to 50-34, but then Lighty made a three and the Buckeyes were off and running again.
Asheville fell to 0-12 against Big Ten teams. The Bulldogs have played eight of their 11 games on the road, including an 80-69 loss at No. 24 North Carolina on Nov. 23 and an 87-72 defeat at No. 16 Georgetown on Nov. 27.
The 23-year-old Lighty is the Buckeyes� elder statesman. He came in with the �Thad Five� in the fall of 2006, a recruiting class that included three players (Greg Oden, Mike Conley Jr. and Daequan Cook) who would be taken in the first round of the NBA draft after their freshman season.
The Buckeyes ended up shooting 57 percent from the field and making 11 of 24 three-pointers.
USC 65, No. 19 TENNESSEE 64: Maurice Jones scored 15 points and the Trojans survived a late run in Knoxville, Tenn.
Donte Smith hit a three-pointer from the wing over the heads of three Tennessee defenders to give the Trojans (7-5) a 65-60 lead with 2:13 left. He missed another with a minute left.
Tobias Harris, who led the Vols with 14 points, got a deep three-point shot off as time expired, but it bounced away.
The Trojans got their first road win in seven attempts. The Vols (7-3) suffered their third loss in a row.
No. 25 TEXAS A&M 86, WAGNER 51: David Loubeau scored 16 points for the Aggies in College Station, Texas.
The game was tied at 13 in the first half when the Aggies (11-1) went on an 11-0 run including consecutive baskets by Loubeau ? to surge past Wagner (4-7).
The Aggies have won eight consecutive games, while the Seahawks have lost four straight.
B.J. Holmes added 12 points for the Aggies. Chris Martin led the Seahawks with 17 points.
SAINT FRANCIS 67, EAST-WEST 53: The NAIA No. 5 Cougars were led by DeJovaun Sawyer-Davis� 15 points and 11 rebounds, for his fifth double-double of the season.
Qadr Owens had 17 points for the Cougars (11-3), who led 21-20 after 20 minutes, and then went on a 46-33 run at the Saint Xavier Tournament.
Sawyer-Davis moved up to No. 3 on the Cougars� career scoring list with 1,771 points, passing Larry Land�s 1,762. Sawyer-Davis is 81 points away from becoming No. 2. VALPARAISO 103, OAKLAND 102: At Rochester, Mich., Brandon Wood scored 35 points and Cory Johnson added 33 as the Crusaders won the Lou Henson Award Holiday Tournament.
Michael Rogers added 10 points for the Crusaders (9-4), who overcame a double-digit deficit in the second half and held off a late charge by the Golden Grizzlies (7-7).
Reggie Hamilton led the Grizzlies with 26 points, and Wright finished with 24.
BALL STATE 95, MOUNT ST. JOSEPH 43: Pierre Sneed scored a career-high 15 points while Jauwan Scaife and Jarrod Jones added another 15 each in the Cardinals� win at Muncie. The Cardinals (6-3) began the game with a 10-0 run and were up 43-18 by halftime. Randy Davis added 14 points for Ball State while Malik Perry scored 13.
Alex Cole scored 12 points, becoming the only player for the Lions (2-9) to score in double digits.
Mount St. Joseph hit 24.6 percent from the field and 60 percent from the free-throw line.

description.hltext_display: Mau tempo: Aeroproto de Frankfurt começa a voltar à normalidade, mas ainda ...
description.content:
Berlim, 22 dez (Lusa) -- O Aeroporto de Frankfurt, o maior da Alemanha, voltou a ter todas pistas de aterrragem a funcionar, e espera conseguir escoar os 3500 passageiros retidos nos últimos dias por causa do mau tempo, foi hoje anunciado.
"Tudo indica que a situação se está a desanuviar e os voos em atraso de terça-feira estão quase recuiperados", disse um porta voz da Fraport, empresa que gere o aerorporto.
Apesar das melhorias hoje ainda terão de ser anulados cerca de 60 voos dos 1340 voos diários, sobretudo devido aos problemas que ainda subsistem noutros aeroprotos europeus, nomeadamente em Londres.
